version_description:
Big update, were added:
- The mechanism of the “Color Mixing” tool has changed, now it is digital.
- New sliders (saturation and brightness) have been added to the “Digital Color Wheel”.
- Now you can delete color combinations in the "Color combinations" (for this use a long press)
- "Color combinations" along with professional colors, now it becomes a hub where all the saved colors are stored.
- Now in all color wheels the phone does not go into sleep mode (we all know how annoying it was in the drawing process when you had your hands in the paint and the phone went into sleep mode and you need to turn it on again)
- The swipes back has been fixed.
- Translations into other languages ​​have been finalized.

Thank you very much for using our application, we love you very much!

- Now you can delete color combinations in the "Color combinations" (for this use a long press)
- "Color combinations" along with professional colors, now it becomes a hub where all the saved colors are stored.
- Now in all color wheels the phone does not go into sleep mode (we all know how annoying it was in the drawing process when you had your hands in the paint and the phone went into sleep mode and you need to turn it on again)
- The swipes back has been fixed.
- Translations into other languages ​​have been finalized.

Thank you very much for using our application, we love you very much!

Big update, were added:

- New sliders (saturation and brightness) have been added to the “Digital Color Wheel”.
- Now you can delete color combinations in the "Color combinations" (for this use a long press)
- "Color combinations" along with professional colors, now it becomes a hub where all the saved colors are stored.
- Now in all color wheels the phone does not go into sleep mode (we all know how annoying it was in the drawing process when you had your hands in the paint and the phone went into sleep mode and you need to turn it on again)
- The swipes back has been fixed.
- Translations into other languages ​​have been finalized.

Thank you very much for using our application, we love you very much!

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Now you can copy colors to the clipboard from the digital color wheel (to do this, click on the color code at the bottom of the screen)
- The rotation mechanism of the digital color wheel has been changed and now this is pure pleasure.

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Abstract color combination in the "Digital color wheel" (amazing for abstract paintings), in fact, it is an analog of the "Abstract color wheel" tool previously available in the app, but is much more flexible.

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- At the request of users, a color combination information button was added (looks like a question mark in the upper right corner of the "Digital color wheel")
- Now you can import your color into the “Digital color wheel” and get the schemes in the same color space. (The button is located in the upper right corner under the information button)

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Added the tool "Value Checker", with it you can check the balance of value in your painting.
- The “Golden Ratio” tool has been moved to the inside of the “Value Checker”.
- A freeze button has been added to the "Color Picker" tool.
- Minor changes in the UI for greater usability.

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Now in the "Digital Color Wheel" and "Color Mixing" tools, you can load the color from the "Color Combination" > "Single" sheet. (Round button with down arrow).
- Now you can save the Swatch colors in "Color Combination" > "Single" (long tap on color).

With all this we are trying to connect all the tools together, into a single workspace.

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- At the request of users, color output was added in CMYK format, now you can output in three formats HEX, RGB, CMYK. (switches in the settings).
- At the request of users, "Image Colors" was added - a tool for capturing colors from an image.

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- The localization has been updated for all countries.
- Material design colors and HTML/CSS colors (by name) were added to the swatch tool.
- A lot of bugs have been fixed.

We are always happy to hear your ideas on how to improve the app on our support page!

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- New features and gestures in the Color Combination tool:
Long press - add to "Liked" list.
Double tap - copy color to clipboard.
Two finger double tap - add color to "Single" list.
Swipe left - delete combination.
- Improved usability of the "Digital color wheel", when switching a combination or when exiting the instrument, its state is saved.
- Added more color combinations.

- The "Abstract color wheel" has been moved from the main menu to the "Classic color wheel" as the "ACW" button. (also the abstract color wheel is presented as a combination in the "Digital color wheel" the same color combination with more flexibility)
- Many small improvements.

Thank you for using our app! In this update:
- Updated the "Color Mixing" tool, now it has three modes RGB, CMYK, RYB, the first two support the input of your own color (to do this, click on the button in the upper left corner, which looks like a circle with an arrow inside)
- Added the ability to use the old (non-digital) version of the "Classic color wheel", you can enable it in the app settings (you can get to the settings from the main menu by clicking on the gear)

Thank you for using our app! In this update:
- Updated the "Color Mixing" tool, now it has three modes RGB, CMYK, RYB, the first two support the input of your own color (to do this, click on the button in the upper left corner, which looks like a circle with an arrow inside)
- Added the ability to use the old (non-digital) version of the "Classic color wheel", you can enable it in the app settings (you can get to the settings from the main menu by clicking on the gear)
